嬼字的基本解释

嬼
liǔ
寡妇。
艳丽美好。

嬼字的汉语字典释义

[①]［liǔ］
［《廣韻》力久切，上有，來。］
(1)寡妇。
(2)美，妖艳。

嬼字的康熙字典解释

【丑集下】【女字部】　嬼； 康熙笔画：18； 页码：页273第30
【廣韻】【集韻】?力久切，音柳。嫠婦也。　又力救切，音溜。【埤蒼】妖也。　又【集韻】力求切，音留。美也。

嬼字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
嬼字的起名意思

暂无。

嬼
Basic explanation of words
嬼
liǔ
widow.
Showy and beautiful.
嬼
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①] [liǔ]
["Guangyun" cuts hard for a long time, come on, come on. ]
(1) Widows.
(2) Beautiful and coquettish.
嬼
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Chou Ji 2] [Female Character Department] 　嬼; Kangxi Strokes: 18; Page Number: Page 273 30
[Guang Yun] [Ji Yun]? Li Jiu cut, Yin Liu.嫠fu also.　I tried to save the cut again, and the sound slipped. [Pi Cang] Demon also.　[Jiyun] Strives to cut and keep the sound. Beauty too.
